Name: maximize_team_velocity
Description: Maximize the average velocity of all teams

Name: minimize_project_budget
Description: Minimize the total budget spent on all projects

Name: maximize_feature_priority
Description: Maximize the sum of priorities for completed features

Name: minimize_blocker_severity
Description: Minimize the total severity of all active blockers

Name: maximize_stakeholder_satisfaction
Description: Maximize the average influence level of satisfied stakeholders

Name: minimize_task_effort
Description: Minimize the total effort of all tasks in the sprint

Name: maximize_sprint_goal_achievement
Description: Maximize the number of sprints where the goal was fully achieved

Name: minimize_worker_availability_gap
Description: Minimize the gap between required and actual worker availability
